22-0071.summary: Recommendation to receive and file notice of adjournment of theJanuary 11, 2022 regular meeting of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California.Page 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 4:15 PMTUESDAY, JANUARY 18, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Richardson, seconded by Commissioner Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and Zendejas2.

22-0072.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday,December 7, 2021.A motion was made by Commissioner Austin, seconded by Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and Zendejas3.

22-0073.summary: Recommendation to Conduct a public hearing to review the proposed Family Self-Sufficiency (FSS) Action Plan (2021-2022), receive supporting documentation into the record, conclude the hearing, adopt resolution to certify the new FSS Action Plan, and authorize the Assistant Executive Director and/or the Deputy Executive Director to transmit them to the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD).  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Allen, seconded by Commissioner Austin, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 01-22. The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and ZendejasEnactment No: H.A. 04-224.
